scripts.postinstall:
echo "============================

Thank you for developing on Prisbeam!

- Run 'npm run build' to build TypeScript code
- Run 'npm run debug' to start the application in debug mode

============================"
scripts.debug-updater: npm run build && cd updater && npx electron main.js && cd ..
